name: Escape The Dungeon (Force_Studios)
description:
Escape The Dungeon is an adventure RPG game, get ready to escape from the strangest cave in the kingdom! Get ready for a difficult game, everything is not easy here!

A long time has passed... the human being has destroyed the world, chaos has arrived and you are given a mission... Find oil, when you enter you realize that this is not just any cave... Now you must try to escape
